="preserve">"Stupid Girl" is a 1996 rock ballad. The song is performed by Garbage. It was released in February of 1996. It was actually recorded in 1994, two years prior to release.
The song has a drum sample of The Clash's single "Train in Vain".
The song was nominated for two Grammy Awards: Best Rock Song and Best Rock Performance by a Duo or Group.
